description: This file provides utility functions for a web application's front-end. It includes functions for reading and saving user theme preferences, copying text to the clipboard with fallback mechanisms, and a simple syntax highlighter for JSX/HTML code snippets.

methods.name: readThemePreference()
methods.description: Retrieves the user's theme preference ('light' or 'dark') from localStorage, falling back to system preference if not set.

methods.name: saveThemePreference(theme)
methods.description: Saves the user's theme preference ('light' or 'dark') to localStorage.

methods.name: copyToClipboard(text)
methods.description: Copies a provided string to the clipboard, using the Clipboard API if available, otherwise falling back to a textarea and execCommand method.

methods.name: simpleHighlight(code)
methods.description: Performs lightweight syntax highlighting on JSX/HTML code snippets by escaping HTML characters and wrapping keywords and strings in styled spans.
